title: Foliar applications of zinc oxide nanoparticles and boric acid affect leaf oxidative metabolism and productivity in young pecan trees
content:
Publication date: 15 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 15

Author(s): O. Cruz-Álvarez, E. Sánchez-Chávez, A. Benavides-Mendoza, O.A. Hernández-Rodríguez, R.A. Parra-Quezada, J.P. Ciscomani-Larios, M.T. Martínez-Damián, D.L. Ojeda-Barrios
